channel.title: Dssim on Vacuum weblog from Edward Vielmetti

item.title: Library notes from Malletts Creek
item.description: Out for a bike ride to Malletts Creek Branch Library after a delicious lunch of BBQ at Ricewood. One of the challenges of low overhead custom postcard making is getting an image manipulation pipeline that kicks out photos that a appropriately cropped and sized. The latest challenge is identifying the single command line that will turn a photo from my phone’s camera into an appropriately sized image for the card with a minimum of cropping, distortion, and manual file transfers.
